subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: For all of Roger Penske’s success, including 15 Indianapolis 500 titles, he had yet to win a Sprint Cup championship. Then Brad Keselowski came along.
snippet: For all of Roger Penske’s success, including 15 Indianapolis 500 titles, he had yet to win a Sprint Cup championship. Then Brad Keselowski came along.
